title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7008.6 - Contact visits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7008.6 - Contact visits

State Regulations
(a) Physical
contact shall be permitted between a prisoner and his visitors. (b) Prisoners and their visitors shall be
required to conduct themselves in a manner consistent with reasonable standards
of public decency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7008.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
